Name: amname
Description: Name of the access method

Name: amstrategies
Description: Number of operator strategies for this access method,\n or zero if access method does not have a fixed set of operator strategies

Name: amsupport
Description: Number of support routines for this access\n method

Name: amcanorder
Description: Does the access method support ordered scans sorted\n by the indexed column's value?

Name: amcanorderbyop
Description: Does the access method support ordered scans sorted\n by the result of an operator on the indexed column?

Name: amcanbackward
Description: Does the access method support backward\n scanning?

Name: amcanunique
Description: Does the access method support unique indexes?

Name: amcanmulticol
Description: Does the access method support multicolumn\n indexes?

Name: amoptionalkey
Description: Does the access method support a scan without any\n constraint for the first index column?

Name: amsearcharray
Description: Does the access method support ScalarArrayOpExpr searches?

Name: amsearchnulls
Description: Does the access method support IS\n NULL/NOT NULL searches?

Name: amstorage
Description: Can index storage data type differ from column data\n type?

Name: amclusterable
Description: Can an index of this type be clustered on?

Name: ampredlocks
Description: Does an index of this type manage fine-grained\n predicate locks?

Name: amkeytype
Description: Type of data stored in index, or zero if not a fixed\n type

Name: aminsert
Description: Insert this tuple\n function

Name: ambeginscan
Description: Prepare for index scan\n function

Name: amgettuple
Description: Next valid tuple\n function, or zero if none

Name: amgetbitmap
Description: Fetch all valid tuples\n function, or zero if none

Name: amrescan
Description: (Re)start index scan\n function

Name: amendscan
Description: Clean up after index\n scan function

Name: ammarkpos
Description: Mark current scan\n position function

Name: amrestrpos
Description: Restore marked scan\n position function

Name: ambuild
Description: Build new index\n function

Name: ambuildempty
Description: Build empty index\n function

Name: ambulkdelete
Description: Bulk-delete function

Name: amvacuumcleanup
Description: Post-VACUUM cleanup\n function

Name: amcanreturn
Description: Function to check whether index supports index-only\n scans, or zero if none

Name: amcostestimate
Description: Function to estimate cost of an index scan

Name: amoptions
Description: Function to parse and validate reloptions for an index
